text:
Subject: Quick question

Good afternoon,

Do you have availability for a king bed room from March 3-5, 2026?

2 guests.

Thanks!
Rachel

Subject: Matrimonial room

Buenos dias,

I need a matrimonial room from December 20-24, 2026 for my wife and myself (2 adults).

Gracias,
Carlos

Subject: Large family reunion

Dear Hotel,

We're planning a family reunion and need:
- 3 double rooms
- 2 twin rooms  
- 1 family suite

Dates: September 10-14, 2026

We'll have approximately 18 people total including 4 children under 10.

Please provide a group rate quote.

Sincerely,
George Thompson

Subject: Weekend stay

Hello,

Need a twin room next Friday for 3 nights, 2 people.

Best,
Sarah

Subject: Room for tonight

Hi,

Do you have any rooms available for tonight (emergency trip)? Just need a single room, 1 person, checking out tomorrow.

Thanks,
Alex

Subject: Re: Your inquiry

Thanks for your email. I'm looking to book a room but I'm not sure of exact dates yet. Probably sometime in spring 2026.

Can you send me your rate sheet?

Thanks,
Paul

Subject: Long-term stay

Hi,

I'm relocating for work and need a room for about 2 weeks starting February 1st, 2026.

Prefer a suite if available. Just me (1 person).

Can you send rates for extended stays?

Thanks,
Nicole

Subject: Honeymoon suite

Dear Hotel Team,

We would like to reserve a suite arriving June 1st, staying 4 nights. This will be for 2 adults.

Thank you,
Michael and Lisa

Subject: Birthday celebration

Hello!

We want to book your best suite for my parent's 50th anniversary, arriving May 25, 2026 for one night only.

2 adults. Please include champagne if possible!

Thanks so much,
Olivia

Subject: Pet-friendly room

Hello,

Do you allow pets? I need a double room for October 5-8, 2026 for me and my husband (2 people). We have a small dog.

Please let me know.

Best,
Laura

Subject: Multiple rooms needed

Hello,

We need 2 double rooms and 1 suite for July 10-13, 2026. 

First double: 2 adults
Second double: 2 adults
Suite: 2 adults and 1 child (age 7)

Thanks!
Amanda

Subject: Accessible room

Dear Hotel,

I need a double room with wheelchair accessibility from June 15-17, 2026 for 2 adults.

Please confirm you have accessible rooms available.

Thank you,
James

Subject: Booking request

Hello,

I need a room with two beds for my daughters (ages 15 and 13) arriving April 10, staying 3 nights.

They will be attending a school event nearby.

Best regards,
Karen

Subject: Two separate bookings

Hi,

I need to make two separate reservations:

1. A double room from July 5-7, 2026 for 2 people
2. A single room from August 12-14, 2026 for 1 person

Please send me quotes for both.

Best regards,
Robert

Subject: Group of friends

Hey!

Me and 5 friends want to come for New Year's Eve (December 31, 2026). We'll need 3 double rooms for one night.

All of us are adults. Looking to party!

Cheers,
Jake

Subject: Wedding party

Dear Hotel Manager,

We're hosting a wedding on August 20, 2026 and will need accommodation for our guests.

Requirements:
- 8 double rooms (August 19-21)
- 2 suites for the bride and groom families (August 19-21)

Total approximately 24 guests, all adults.

Can you provide a wedding package quote?

Best regards,
Victoria Anderson
Wedding Planner

Subject: Business trip

Good morning,

I need a single room arriving next Monday for 2 nights. Just 1 person.

Thanks,
Tom

Sent from my iPhone
